mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.xiaoyoufenhui_name as xiaoyoufenhuiName ,a.xiaoyoufenhui_types as xiaoyoufenhuiTypes ,a.xiaoyoufenhui_photo as xiaoyoufenhuiPhoto ,a.xiaoyoufenhui_fuzheren as xiaoyoufenhuiFuzheren ,a.xiaoyoufenhui_address as xiaoyoufenhuiAddress ,a.xiaoyoufenhui_content as xiaoyoufenhuiContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM xiaoyoufenhui a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.xiaoyoufenhui_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiaoyoufenhuiName},'%')
and a.xiaoyoufenhui_types = #{params.xiaoyoufenhuiTypes}
and a.xiaoyoufenhui_fuzheren like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiaoyoufenhuiFuzheren},'%')
and a.xiaoyoufenhui_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiaoyoufenhuiAddress},'%')
and a.xiaoyoufenhui_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiaoyoufenhuiContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
